name: Japan
interestingFacts: It is home to the world's busiest pedestrian crossing, Shibuya Crossing.

name: France
interestingFacts: France is the most visited country in the world.
The Eiffel Tower was initially meant to be a temporary structure.

name: Brazil
interestingFacts: Brazil is the only country in South America that speaks Portuguese.
It has the largest rainforest in the world, the Amazon.

name: India
interestingFacts: India has the world's second-largest population.
The number zero was invented in India.

name: Australia
interestingFacts: Australia is home to the Great Barrier Reef, the world's largest coral reef system.
It has more kangaroos than people.

name: Canada
interestingFacts: Canada has the longest coastline in the world.
It has more lakes than the rest of the world combined.
